mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_vehicle (id, vehicle_type_id, org_id, number, intercom_group, gps_id, gps_name, purpose, brand, site_qty, sync_state, platform_id ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{vehicleTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{intercomGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gpsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gpsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{purpose,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{siteQty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{syncState,jdbcType=BIT}, #{platformId,jdbcType=INTEGER} )

mapper.update:
update t_vehicle
vehicle_type_id = #{vehicleTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
number = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
intercom_group = #{intercomGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gps_id = #{gpsId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
gps_name = #{gpsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
purpose = #{purpose,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
brand = #{brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
site_qty = #{siteQty,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sync_state = #{syncState,jdbcType=BIT},
platform_id = #{platformId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_vehicle set vehicle_type_id = #{vehicleTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, number = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, intercom_group = #{intercomGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gps_id = #{gpsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gps_name = #{gpsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, purpose = #{purpose,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, brand = #{brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, site_qty = #{siteQty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sync_state = #{syncState,jdbcType=BIT}, platform_id = #{platformId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.delete:
delete from t_vehicle where id in
#{item}
mapper.select: select * from t_vehicletype order by id asc
select * from t_intercom_group order by id asc

select
from t_vehicle
order by id
limit #{pageStart,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select distinct
v.id, vt.id as vehicleTypeId, v.org_id as orgId, v.number, v.intercom_group as intercomgroup, v.gps_id as gpsId, v.gps_name as gpsName, v.purpose, v.brand, v.site_qty as siteQty, v.sync_state as syncState, v.platform_id as platformId, vt.name as typeName, o.short_name as orgName, o.code as orgCode, o.path as orgPath, tg.number as gpsNumber, tg.icon_url as iconUrl
from t_vehicle v left join t_vehicletype vt on vt.id = v.vehicle_type_id left join organ o on o.id = v.org_id left join t_gps tg on v.gps_id = tg.id
left join t_duty_vehicle_group_member gm on gm.vehicle_id = v.id left join t_duty_vehicle_group pg on pg.id = gm.group_id
where ( o.id = #{orgId,jdbcType=INTEGER} or o.path like CONCAT(#{orgPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},"/",#{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},"%") )
and v.number like CONCAT('%','${number}','%' )
and v.vehicle_type_id in
#{item}
and pg.id in
#{gitem}
